channel.title: The Strain - Book/TV
channel.description: I have been watching the show "The Strain" and absolutely love the combination of vampirism and science. I recently began to read the books and still on the first one but I definitely think it is a great horror show/book with a great plot. Anyone else read the books or watched the show?

item.title: The Strain - Book/TV
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

I have been watching the show “The Strain” and absolutely love the combination of vampirism and science. I recently began to read the books and still on the first one but I definitely think it is a great horror show/book with a great plot. Anyone else read the books or watched the show?
